title: Return To Kuku Island - Snap Classic
description: A woman revisits remote Indonesian islands where she and thousands of other Vietnamese refugees were once stranded without food, water, or shelter. She returns to this tiny place on the edge of the world... one last time.
itunes:title: Return To Kuku Island - Snap Classic
itunes:subtitle: In the 1970s, thousands of Vietnamese refugees were left on the remote Anambas Islands in Indonesia. They were stranded without food, water, and shelter, forced to survive off the land. Now, almost 40 years later, one woman wants to go back to those dist
author: paloma.orozco@prx.org (Snap Judgment and PRX)
itunes:author: Snap Judgment and PRX
itunes:summary: A woman revisits remote Indonesian islands where she and thousands of other Vietnamese refugees were once stranded without food, water, or shelter. She returns to this tiny place on the edge of the world... one last time.
